about_the_game:
Gameplay Details

Super Beast Project is a two-player online battle game that combines turn-based, battle chess and strategy play to bring players endless challenges and fun. You can choose to face off against strangers or friends, here is the detailed gameplay introduction.

Selectozoon

Enter the selection screen: First, you will enter the super beast selection screen. Here, you can browse the details of each superbeast, including skills, attributes, and elemental restraint relationships.

Choose Superbeasts: You can choose up to six superbeasts per battle. In the selection process, you can see the super beast selected by the other side, so that according to factors such as element restraint relationship, skill matching, strategically select the super beast that can defeat the other side to play the game.

Go into Battle

Battlefield setting: At present, the game only opens a grassland battlefield, and more types of battlefields will be opened in the later stage to add diversity to the battle.

Battle preparation: Once you enter the battlefield, the player character will be part of the battle, and you need to plan for the following four types of actions:

Summon: Summon the super beast to the designated position and prepare for the next battle.
Items: Use a variety of items to enhance your super beast abilities or interfere with your opponent's strategy.
Movement: Command characters and superbeasts move around the battlefield to gain vantage points.
Skills: Select the super beast skills to release, anticipate the opponent's behavior, and formulate the best strategy.
Plan execution: When both players have completed the operation plan, the character and the super beast will begin to execute the action according to the plan, and the fierce battle.

Round cycle: The round ends after all plans have been executed. The game moves on to the next round, and players continue to develop new battle strategies until one side wins.

Key Strategy

Elemental restraint: Use the elemental restraint relationship between superbeasts to choose superbeasts that can restrain each other and improve the winning rate.
Skill matching: Each super beast has three unique skills, a reasonable combination of skills, to maximize the combat effect.
Dynamic game: Adjust the strategy in real time, according to the opponent's actions and battlefield changes, flexible response, show your wisdom and courage.
In Project SuperBeast, every battle is a battle of brain power and skill. Come experience this game full of strategy and passion, capture your super beast, develop your tactics, and compete with players around the world!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows7以上
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

  • OS: windows7以上
  • Processor: intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
